text:
Coursera | Mountain View, CA. on-site

Coursera is hiring!

We are looking for frontend, backend, and mobile engineers to join our team. We use scala/play, react, cassandra, and other technologies across our stack.

Solving education at scale is challenging and rewarding. Especially as you are able to see people's lives transform because of what you do.

Learn more at https://www.coursera.org/about/careers
